TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HebrewCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 代表希伯來曆法。

span.span: Represents the Hebrew calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 希伯來曆法辨識兩個紀元： 西元前The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. （在一般紀元） 之前，上午(before the common era) and A.M. （拉丁文"Anno Mundi"，這表示 「 年的全球 」）。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有目前紀元 (A.M.) 和希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.) and the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). > [!NOTE] > 如需使用類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 在被 19、 第 3、 6、 8、 11、 14 整除一年的結尾是每個 19 年週期內，17 和 19 年都是潤年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 一般年份可以有 353 到 355 天，視猶太節日的位置而定。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 閏年對 383 385 天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. 希伯來曆法具有 12 個月期間和閏年 13 個月：The Hebrew calendar has 12 months during common years and 13 months during leap years: |GetMonth 值 （年）GetMonth value (common year)|GetMonth 值年 （閏年）GetMonth value (leap year)|月份Month|常見的年數天Days in common years|閏年的天數Days in leap years| |------------------------------------|----------------------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|11|תשרי (Tishrei)תשרי (Tishrei)|3030|3030| |22|22|חשון (Cheshvan)חשון (Cheshvan)|29/3029/30|29/3029/30| |33|33|כסלו (Kislev)כסלו (Kislev)|29/3029/30|29/3029/30| |44|44|טבת tevet （月）טבת (Tevet)|2929|2929| |55|55|שבט (Shevat)שבט (Shevat)|3030|3030| |66|-|אדר (Adar)אדר (Adar)|2929|-| |-|66|אדר א （Adar 引）אדר א (Adar Alef)|-|3030| |-|77|אדר ב (Adar Beit)אדר ב (Adar Beit)|-|2929| |77|88|ניסן (Nissan)ניסן (Nissan)|3030|3030| |88|99|אייר (Iyar)אייר (Iyar)|2929|2929| |99|1010|סיון (Sivan)סיון (Sivan)|3030|3030| |1010|1111|תמוז (Tamuz)תמוז (Tamuz)|2929|2929| |1111|1212|אב (Av)אב (Av)|3030|3030| |1212|1313|אלול (Elul)אלול (Elul)|2929|2929| 在 Cheshvan 和 Kislev 天猶太節日的位置而有所不同。The days in Cheshvan and Kislev vary depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 閏年，Adar 會取代所 Adar 引 30 天內與 Adar Beit 29 天。During leap years, Adar is replaced by Adar Alef with 30 days and Adar Beit with 29 days. Adar 引會被視為閏月。Adar Alef is considered the leap month. 天; leap Adar 引和所有中 Adar Beit 日期會被視為的最後一天也就是說，方法會傳回`true`這些天。The last day of Adar Alef and all the days in Adar Beit are considered leap days; that is, the method returns `true` for these days. 日期年 1 月 1，2001 A.D.。The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在西曆相當於目前年度第六個星期幾 tevet 月 5761 上午in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the sixth day of Tevet in the year 5761 A.M. 在希伯來曆法。in the Hebrew calendar. 每個支援一組的行事曆。Each supports a set of calendars. 屬性會傳回預設的行事曆文化特性，而屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，應用程式應該設定屬性至新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new . ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含所支援的日期範圍的檔案類別，並顯示在一 5772 年每月的天數。The following example creates a file that contains the date ranges supported by the class, and displays the number of days in each month of the year 5772. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.hebrewcalendar.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.hebrewcalendar.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 此範例會具現化物件，並使它希伯來文 （以色列） 的現行曆法物件。The example instantiates a object and makes it the current calendar of a Hebrew (Israel) object. 然後，它可讓希伯來文 （以色列） 目前執行緒文化特性。It then makes Hebrew (Israel) the current thread culture. 這會導致 common language runtime 解譯所有日期和時間相對於希伯來曆法。This causes the common language runtime to interpret all dates and times in relation to the Hebrew calendar.

public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);

param.name: time
param.span: 要在其中新增 months 的 。

span.span: The to which to add months.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 傳回與指定 相差指定月數的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: ，由將指定的月數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 Av，有 30 天，指定一天是該月第 30 天，而`months`參數為 5，產生的年份是其中一個以上的指定的年、 產生的月份為 Tevet，且產生的日期為 t他 tevet 的最後一天中的第 29 天。For example, if the specified month is Av, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 5, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Tevet, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Tevet. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面希伯來曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.

returns.span: ，由將指定的年數加入指定的 所產生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 例如，Cheshvan 可以有 29 或 30 天，視猶太節日的位置而定。For example, Cheshvan can have 29 or 30 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 假設 Cheshvan 有 30 天，在目前年度和下列年 29。Suppose that Cheshvan has 30 days in the current year and 29 in the following year. 如果指定的日期，而且 Cheshvan 在目前年度的第 30 天的值`years`為 1，則產生的日期會 Cheshvan 下列目前年度第 29 天。If the specified date is the 30th day of Cheshvan in the current year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 29th day of Cheshvan in the following year. 產生的月份部分如果產生的月份不是有效的月中產生的年份會受到影響。The month part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is not a valid month in the resulting year. 它會變更為有效結果年的月。It is changed to the last valid month in the resulting year. 例如，如果中的月份`time`參數是潤年中的第 13 月份值`years`是 1，在產生的月份是下列的年份是否為非-閏年第 12 個月。For example, if the month in the `time` parameter is the 13th month of a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the month in the resulting is the 12th month of the following year, which is a non-leap year. 請注意，即使沒有變更的月份部分，它仍可能參考至不同的月份。Note that even when the month part does not change, it might still refer to a different month. 例如，Adar Beit 是潤年 7 月但 Nissan 第 7 個月在一般年。For example, Adar Beit is the 7th month in leap years, but Nissan is the 7th month in common years. 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面希伯來曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 希伯來曆法辨識兩個紀元： 西元前The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. （在一般紀元） 之前，上午(before the common era) and A.M. （拉丁文"Anno Mundi"，這表示 「 年的全球 」）。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有目前紀元 (A.M.)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.). 這個屬性永遠會傳回只有一個元素的陣列。This property always returns an array with only one element.

summary.span: 傳回指定之 中一年中的日期。

span.span: Returns the day of the year in the specified .

returns.span: 從 1 到 385 的整數，代表指定的 中一年中的日期 。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 385 that represents the day of the year in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年份的日期被定義為一年的第一天中的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和的上個月的最後一天傳回該年度的總天數，這相同的值由。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面希伯來曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，這個方法傳回 29 或 30 Cheshvan，根據猶太節日的位置。For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Cheshvan, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`GetDaysInMonth`每五年的每個紀元中的第二個月份。The following code example calls `GetDaysInMonth` for the second month in each of five years in each era. remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，這個方法會傳回整數 353 至 355 或 383 至 385 根據猶太節日的位置並根據是否`year`是否為閏年。For example, this method returns an integer from 353 to 355 or from 383 to 385, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays and depending on whether `year` is a leap year. 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`GetDaysInYear`五年的每個紀元。The following code example calls `GetDaysInYear` for five years in each era. span.span: The to read.

summary.span: 傳回指定 中的紀元。

returns.span: 整數，表示指定 中的紀元。

span.span: An integer that represents the era in the specified .

returns.span: 傳回值永遠都會是 。

span.span: The return value is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 希伯來曆法辨識兩個紀元： 西元前The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. （在一般紀元） 之前，上午(before the common era) and A.M. （拉丁文"Anno Mundi"，這表示 「 年的全球 」）。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 這項實作類別可辨識只有目前紀元 (A.M.)，並只希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.) and only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面希伯來曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

public: override int GetLeapMonth(int year, int era);

span.span: A year.
An era.
Specify either or .

summary.span: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 正整數，指出在指定的年份及紀元中的閏月。

span.span: A positive integer that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.

returns.span: 如果 和 參數指定閏年，則傳回值是 7，但如果不是閏年，則傳回 0。

span.span: The return value is 7 if the and parameters specify a leap year, or 0 if the year is not a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 曆法，支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: is not or .
-or-

exception.span: 小於希伯來曆法 5343 年或大於希伯來曆法 5999 年。

span.span: is less than the Hebrew calendar year 5343 or greater than the Hebrew calendar year 5999.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位的值為 1。The value of this field is 1. 希伯來曆法辨識兩個紀元： 西元前The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. （在一般紀元） 之前，上午(before the common era) and A.M. （拉丁文"Anno Mundi"，這表示 「 年的全球 」）。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有目前紀元 (A.M.)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.).

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 判斷指定紀元中指定的日期是否為閏日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期為閏日，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 在被 19、 第 3、 6、 8、 11、 14 整除一年的結尾是每個 19 年週期內，17 和 19 年都是潤年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 一般年份可以有 353 到 355 天，視猶太節日的位置而定。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 閏年對 383 385 天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. Adar 引和所有中 Adar Beit 日期會被視為的最後一天中希伯來曆法，leap 天。In the Hebrew calendar, the last day of Adar Alef and all the days in Adar Beit are considered leap days. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`IsLeapDay`的第二個月 （二月） 五年的每個紀元的最後一天。The following code example calls `IsLeapDay` for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the first moment of January, 1, 1583 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Visual Basic 中表示為所支援的最小日期的指定時間的時間類型，這是公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by the type, which is January 1, 0001 C.E. 不過，類型不支援的最小日期。However, the type does not support that minimum date. 因此，如果您呼叫方法來設定使用現行曆法的日期時間的格式，但您不指定格式規範，格式就會使用 ISO 8601 可排序 ("s") 的日期/時間模式格式規範，而不是預設一般 ("G") 的日期/時間模式格式規範。Consequently, if you call a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but you do not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/CPP/hebrewcalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/CS/hebrewcalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/VB/hebrewcalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime ToDateTime (int year, int month, int day, int hour, int minute, int second, int millisecond, int era);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.DateTime ToDateTime(int32 year, int32 month, int32 day, int32 hour, int32 minute, int32 second, int32 millisecond, int32 era) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToDateTime (year As Integer, month As Integer, day As Integer, hour As Integer, minute As Integer, second As Integer, millisecond As Integer, era As Integer) As DateTime
public: override DateTime ToDateTime(int year, int month, int day, int hour, int minute, int second, int millisecond, int era);

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.name: month
param.span: 從 1 到 13 的整數，表示月份。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 13 that represents the month.

param.name: day
param.span: 從 1 到 30 的整數，表示日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 30 that represents the day.

param.name: hour
param.span: 從 0 到 23 的整數，表示小時。

span.span: An integer from 0 to 23 that represents the hour.

param.name: minute
param.span: 從 0 到 59 的整數，表示分鐘。

span.span: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the minute.

param.name: second
param.span: 從 0 到 59 的整數，表示秒鐘。

span.span: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the second.

param.name: millisecond
param.span: 從 0 到 999 的整數，表示毫秒。

span.span: An integer from 0 to 999 that represents the millisecond.
An integer that represents the era.
Specify either or .

summary.span: 傳回在指定紀元中設定為指定日期和時間的 。

span.span: Returns a that is set to the specified date and time in the specified era.

returns.span: ，設定為目前紀元中指定的日期和時間。

span.span: The that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，因為它可以將任何以現行曆法的日期轉換成的西曆日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 西曆日期之後可用，例如，比較在不同的行事曆中的日期，或建立特定的日曆中的相等的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar. 這項實作類別能夠辨識只有希伯來文 5343 年到 5999 (西曆的 1583年到 2239)。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar).

exception.span: 、、 或 在目前 物件所支援的範圍之外。

span.span: , , or is outside the range supported by the current object.
-or-
is less than 0 or greater than 23.
-or-
is less than 0 or greater than 59.
-or-
is less than 0 or greater than 59.
-or-
is less than 0 or greater than 999.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: 2 位數年份從 0 到 99，或 4 位數希伯來曆法年份從 5343 到 5999。

span.span: A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Hebrew calendar year from 5343 through 5999.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換為 4 位數年份，方法是使用 屬性以判斷適當的世紀。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a 4-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 如果 參數是 2 位數年份，則傳回值為對應的 4 位數年份。

span.span: If the parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.

returns.span: 如果 參數是 4 位數年份，則傳回值會是未變更的 參數。

span.span: If the parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用`year`參數，屬性，並計算 4 位數年份的年份。The method uses the `year` parameter, the property, and a year to calculate a 4-digit year. 世紀所找到的唯一項目決定`year`該 100 年範圍內的參數。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the `year` parameter within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 5729，100 年範圍是從 5630 到 5729。For example, if is set to 5729, the 100-year range is from 5630 to 5729. 因此，30 的值會解譯為 5630 中,，而值為 29 會解譯為 5729。Therefore, a value of 30 is interpreted as 5630, while a value of 29 is interpreted as 5729. 如果屬性有特殊的值是 99，方法就會忽略地區設定和語言選項控制台 中，並傳回值`year`參數保持不變。If the property has the special value 99, the method ignores the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel and returns the value of the `year` parameter unchanged. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

span.span: is less than 0.
-or-
is less than or greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性允許 2 位數的年份的 4 位數年份正確轉譯。The property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果這個屬性設定為 5729，100 年範圍是從 5630 到 5729。For example, if this property is set to 5729, the 100-year range is from 5630 to 5729. 因此，將 30 的 2 位數值解譯為 5630，，而 2 位數為 29 值會解譯為 5729。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 5630, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 5729. 這個屬性的起始值被衍生自 控制台 的地區及語言選項 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 如果初始系統設定變更您的應用程式的生命期限內類別不會自動偵測變更。If the initial system setting changes during the life of your application the class does not automatically detect the change. 特殊值 99 原因方法略過系統設定，並傳回指定的年份保持不變。The special value 99 causes the method to ignore the system settings and return the specified year unchanged.

exception.span: 目前的 物件是唯讀的。

span.span: The current object is read-only.

exception.span: 設定作業時，希伯來曆法的年份值小於 5343 但不是 90，或是年份值大於 5999。

span.span: In a set operation, the Hebrew calendar year value is less than 5343 but is not 99, or the year value is greater than 5999.
